name: Linear
natural_language_description: 这是 Linear 节点。主要用于: Consume Linear API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: issue

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Add Link (值: addLink) - Add a link to an issue
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many issues

issueId.name: issueId
issueId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assigneeId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stateId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assigneeId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stateId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
teamId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
